appetizers.description: Delicious house-made fries, double-fried for a crunchy fry with a deliciously smooth interior.
Gluten-free breadsticks made from the finest ingredients. A cauliflower base is used for the bread, keeping you healthy and satisfied.

cold sandwiches.description: A traditional BLT sandwich with thick-cut peppered bacon, home-grown lettuce and tomatoes, and house-made mayonaise.
Move over, Arbys. The Roast Beef Deluxe brings you the very best beef around, on artisan dill rye bread, and topped with Swiss Cheee, tomatoes, spinach, and ajou dressing to top it off.

hot sandwhiches.description: The best parts of a meat lovers pizza meat the combined with the deliciousness of a sub sandwhich. A sourdough 'crust', pepperoni, salami, ham, mozzarella, paramsean, and pizza sauce create a flavor explosion too good to pass up.
Dill rye brad with ham, turkey, swiss cheee, spinach and a balsamic oil finish. A sure crowd-pleaser.

desserts.description: A traditiona hot fudge sundae made with love from the finest ingredients.
House-made coconut creme in a delicous graham-cracker crust. One bite and you'll be in love.

drinks.description: Tea is overrated - replace those boring herbs with liquor, liquor, and a little liquor to top it off.
All the crisp refreshing accents of Sprite, mixed with the sweet nector of potatoes. It's fruits and vegetables, so it's good for you. Trust us, we're professionals.
